original_text: “‘If any of your fellow Israelites become poor and are unable to support themselves among you, help them as you would a foreigner and stranger, so they can continue to live among you.
korean_text: 네 형제가 가난하게 되어 빈 손으로 네 곁에 있거든 너는 그를 도와 거류민이나 동거인처럼 너와 함께 생활하게 하되

sentences.original_text: If any of your fellow Israelites become poor
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 당신의 동족 이스라엘 사람이 가난해진다면

sentences.original_text: and are unable to support themselves among you
sentences.korean_translation: 당신들 가운데서 스스로를 부양할 수 없게 되면

sentences.original_text: help them as you would a foreigner and stranger
so they can continue to live among you
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 당신들과 함께 계속 살아갈 수 있도록 하라
